coded_answer.p: Dear Sir/Madam The Circle Theatre manager
I am writing to complain about your productshow. I would like you to backreturn my money because that was not same as your advertisement.
I was planning to spend my holiday in London when I found your advertisement. In the advertisement, you mentioned actors, time, price discount and equipmentfacilities.

DANNY BROOK is one of my favoritefavourite actoractors so I decided to buy a ticket even ifeven though I cancelhad to cancel my apointmentappointment on that day at 18=3018.30 and asloalso notice of price discount impressed me. However, when I wentgot to the theatre, you didn't anything not onlynot only didn't have any discountdiscounts but also apporogizeapologizehad to apologize to us for the dalaydelay ofin starting the musical. In addition a different actor appeared on the stage and I couldn't have dinner aboutafter the musical because the restrantrestaurant had beenwas closed. It made me so dissapointdisappointdisappointed and angry.
You should backreturn my money immedeastryimmediately because that night was far from parfectperfect.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets.

He always tried to say nothing and did. But everyone always noticedsaw he had a secretssecret from his facefrom his face he had a secret. Whenever he has a secretssecret, his nose moves quickly. He had not likeddid not like this habit and had thought it was wrostworstbad of him until he solved a big crime.

When all the money had gone from a bank, nobadynobody was there except Pat. BankThe bank robbers saidtold him if Pat told the fact somebody they killedwould kill him. So., Pat didn't say anything. But his nose moved quickly when the police showed him a picture of the bank robbers.

Then the police realized who were bank robbersthe bank robbers were and arestedarrested them. Although the bank robbers complained to Pat, he saidhad said nothing to anybodyhadn't said anything to anybody. He just moved his nose!!
Thanks to his habit, he is still alive and all the money werewas backedreturned to the bank. The town became peacepeaceful again.
